ygData.subject: RE: Re: Songs and Resists
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, the MR debuff for Curtailing Chant went from -13 to -10 before and after the patch when I tested it on myself. That btw is the big unknown in all this.
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Dec 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> the damage part is true, but it only applies to damage to hp as far as I
> know, I believe all other debuffs are the same vs. player as vs. npc.

No, the MR debuff for Curtailing Chant went from -13 to -10
before and after the patch when I tested it on myself.

That btw is the big unknown in all this. It certainly seems
the song is broken against mobs as it is when you use it on
yourself. But maybe there's some PvP limitation that's being
applied when you use it on yourself.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
